name: chancery
content:
chancery noun
(LAW)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] (also Chancery Division, Lord Chancellor's Court) in the UK, a court that is part of the High Court of Justice: Mr Justice Lightman, in a judgment in the Chancery Division, allowed the appeal.
[ C or U ] (also court of chancery, Chancery Court) a court of equity in some US states: If the patient is not satisfied with that decision, he or she may sue in Chancery Court.
